sources.title: Pay The Ghost | Full Movie | Action Thriller | Nicolas Cage
sources.description:
Pay The Ghost - Almost a year after his young son disappeared on Halloween in New York City, Mike is haunted by terrifying visions of his son. He reunites with his estranged wife and discovers that every Halloween a vengeful ghost surfaces to abduct children and if they don't recover their son within a short window of time, he will be lost to the spirit world forever.
2015.  Stars: Nicolas Cage, Sarah Wayne Callies, Veronica Ferres
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: One year after Mike Lawford's young son disappeared during a Halloween carnival, he is haunted by ghostly images and terrifying messages he can't explain. Together with his estranged wife, he will stop at nothing to unravel the mystery and find their son-and, in doing so, he unearths the legend of the crying woman who refuses to remain buried in the past.
metadata.Actors: Nicolas Cage, Sarah Wayne Callies, Veronica Ferres
